Key Match Events: Stowers drove in a game-high four with three RBI knocks
Post-Match Reflections: Stowers expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Manager Skip Schumaker praised Stowers for adjusting to the league
Miscellaneous Highlights: Family members, like Stowers' mom, were able to see him play in a Marlins uniform for the first time this week
Stowers is 9-for-20 (.450) with two doubles, one triple, one homer, six RBIs, one walk and seven strikeouts since his hit streak
